name: ΕΝΩΣΗ ΘΕΣΜΙΚΩΝ ΕΠΕΝΔΥΤΩΝ - HELLENIC FUND AND ASSET MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION
goal: We are a private law non profit company, the trade association representing Mutual Fund Management Companies, Asset Management firms, REICs, Portfolio Investment Companies, and other AIFMs. Our purpose is to promote the industry of above mentioned collective investment schemes and professional discretionary asset management.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU INITIATIVES: CAPITAL MARKETS UNION, UCITS v, MIFID II, PRIPS, CMD V, AIFMD, PEPP, SRD II, AML, EUVECA-EUSEF, BENCHMARKS, SECURITISATION, IFRS 9, FTT, MMFs, CCTB & CCCTB, GDPR, CSDR, IORP II.
